reviews.review_msg: Fair grader and is very approachable.

Eh its a TA for tutorial not professor. Tutorials usually are boring no matter the course, no ones fault. For this class it wasnt bad, good info and related to the course, helped make sense of things, well organized

Unusually hard grading for a first-year class. However, his biggest sin was his trying to overcompensate by "rewarding" students with higher participation marks only for them to be curved downwards after they were "too high." Not cool, especially during a pandemic in a FIRST-year class.
